proposal.customizedPitch:
Hi Abiola,

I'm David Ariyo, a Full Stack Developer who helps growing-business companies improve their online presence and customer conversion.

I analyzed Enkay Indo Nigerian Industries Limited's website and found several opportunities that could impact your business:

1. Add meta description - lower click-through rates from search results
2. Implement main heading (H1) found - confusing for users and search engines
3. Optimize website loading: 3.5s (should be under 3s) - losing potential customers

For an established small business (11-50 employees), addressing these areas will enhance customer experience and competitive positioning.

My recent projects include:
• Building real-time web applications for Dassage (MERN stack)
• Developing e-commerce solutions for DAstore with payment integration
• Optimizing site performance resulting in 40%+ speed improvements

Companies in your industry typically see 25-50% improvements in web performance and user engagement.

I can show you the exact steps to write meta descriptions that double your click-through rates - you'll see immediate results. Would you have 10 minutes this week for me to demonstrate the solution?

Best regards,
David Ariyo
Full Stack Developer | MERN Specialist
Phone: (+234) 903-6184-863
Email: davidariyo109@gmail.com
Portfolio: davidariyo.onrender.com
